---
category: news
title: "A machine learning model for identifying patients at risk for wild-type transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy"
excerpt: "Transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy is a treatable but often unrecognized cause of heart failure. We derived and validated a machine learning model based on medical diagnostic codes that identifies heart failure patients at risk for wild-type transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy."
publishedDateTime: 2021-05-11T09:25:00Z
